title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Zarichchya, Leonivka of Chernihiv region, Oleksiyivka, My...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Zarichchya, Leonivka of Chernihiv region, Oleksiyivka, Myropillya of Sumy region, Veterynarne, Vovchansk, Potykhonove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Bochkove, Uspenivka, Khrypuny of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
